long_description: Something is off. The world you once knew seems... distorted. Every surface bears the marks of an unexplainable instability, a flaw creeping into every corner. Colors repeat in a hypnotic pattern, as if reality itself has glitched. No familiar details remainâ€”only a persistent signal that something isn't right. Are you sure you're still where you were supposed to be?
name: broken_textures
short_description: Reality fractures into a looping anomaly, leaving only a distorted echo of what once was.
title: broken_textures
